sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS_MASTER ( class_master_id, name, type, level, status, summary, count, rest, punish_class, punish_point, s_date, e_date, day, place, teacher_id, student_id, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #class_master_id#, #name#, #type#, #level#, #status#, #summary#, #count#, #rest#, #punish_class#, #punish_point#, #s_date#, #e_date#, #day#, #place#, #teacher_id#, #student_id#, #updater#, #update_time# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT class_master_id,c.name,c.type,t.name type_name, level,status,summary,count,rest,punish_class,punish_point,s_date,e_date,day,place, student_id, (SELECT name FROM person WHERE person_id=student_id) as student_name, teacher_id, (SELECT name FROM person WHERE person_id=teacher_id) as teacher_name, updater,update_time FROM CLASS_MASTER c LEFT JOIN class_type t ON c.type = t.type class_master_id = #class_master_id# c.name = #name# c.type = #type# level = #level# status = #status# summary = #summary# count = #count# rest = #rest# rest > $restMoreThen$ punish_class = #punish_class# punish_point = #punish_point# s_date = #s_date# e_date = #e_date# e_date > #e_dateMoreThan# day = #day# place = #place# teacher_id = #teacher_id# student_id = #student_id# updater = #updater# update_time = #update_time# rest > 0 teacher_id in ( SELECT p.person_id FROM person p JOIN account a ON p.person_id = a.person_id WHERE p.name like #like_teacher_name# AND a.role = '1' ) student_id in ( SELECT p.person_id FROM person p JOIN account a ON p.person_id = a.person_id WHERE p.name like #like_student_name# AND a.role = '2' ) ORDER BY s_date , $order$ desc $fromIndex$, $rowLimit$ $rowLimit$

SELECT count(*) count FROM CLASS_MASTER class_master_id = #class_master_id# c.name = #name# c.type = #type# level = #level# status = #status# summary = #summary# count = #count# rest = #rest# rest > $restMoreThen$ punish_class = #punish_class# punish_point = #punish_point# s_date = #s_date# e_date = #e_date# e_date > #e_dateMoreThan# day = #day# place = #place# teacher_id = #teacher_id# student_id = #student_id# updater = #updater# update_time = #update_time# rest > 0 teacher_id in ( SELECT p.person_id FROM person p JOIN account a ON p.person_id = a.person_id WHERE p.name like #like_teacher_name# AND a.role = '1' ) student_id in ( SELECT p.person_id FROM person p JOIN account a ON p.person_id = a.person_id WHERE p.name like #like_student_name# AND a.role = '2' )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CLASS_MASTER class_master_id = #class_master_id# name = #name# type = #type# level = #level# status = #status# summary = #summary# count = #count# rest = #rest# punish_class = #punish_class# punish_point = #punish_point# s_date = #s_date# e_date = #e_date# day = #day# place = #place# teacher_id = #teacher_id# updater = #updater# update_time = #update_time# WHERE class_master_id = #class_master_id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS_MASTER ( class_master_id, name, type, level, status, summary, count, rest, s_date, e_date, day, place, teacher_id, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #class_master_id#, #name#, #type#, #level#, #status#, #summary#, #count#, #rest#, #s_date#, #e_date#, #day#, #place#, #teacher_id#, #updater#, #update_time# ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE class_master_id = #class_master_id#
